dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 259 x 120 cm (8 ft. 5 15/16 in. x 47 1/4 in.)
Repeat H: 60 cm (23 5/8 in.)
title: Nuno me Gara (1981)
medium:
Medium: cotton, overspun yarns
Technique: jacquard controlled double weave (two intercrossing plain weave structures)
description: The woven pattern creates a photographic image of randomly arranged strips of crinkled fabric, in shades of red.
